title: Can someone explain why Ryze is so weak?
body: It takes soooo much spamming of the same spells just to kill someone. (and that's on top of having to land his slow ass Q skillshot) Spamming the same spell 25 times just to beat someone down is just plain tiresome (zzzz...) I remember when he used to be fun and powerful..what happened?!

replies.body:
I'd <3 curb stomping players with qeqweqeqrqrqeqweqerqerqwerqwerqrqwr in a matter of .5 sec and then see all my manas gone lol. But then Rito knew  he was 2 powerful so they had to sidegrade him a bunch of times, classified as reworks so much that it became a meme, a joke, and he's getting another 1 btw xd.

because he is good in the hands of a good player
